casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Devon Armond GAYLES. No. 399P15. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Jan. 28, 2016. Teresa M. Postell, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North. Devon A. Gayles, for Gayles, Devon Armond. Todd Williams, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 30th of November 2015 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the Superior Court, Buncombe County, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court of that County:

"Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 28th of January 2016."
